description:
Branch: master

Compute Configuration:
libvirt_type=kvm

Scenario:
1. Spawn an instance.
2. Once the instance is up and running, snapshot the instance.

Expected Behavior:
Instance snapshot should be created.

Actual Behavior:
Snapshot operation fails (stack trace can be found here: http://paste.openstack.org/show/24594/).
title: Snapshot instance failure on libvirt

comments.content:
Branch: master

Compute Configuration:
libvirt_type=kvm

Scenario:
1. Spawn an instance.
2. Once the instance is up and running, snapshot the instance.

Expected Behavior:
Instance snapshot should be created.

Actual Behavior:
Snapshot operation fails (stack trace can be found here: http://paste.openstack.org/show/24594/).
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~unmesh-gurjar

Fix proposed to branch: master

    Fixes snapshot instance failure on libvirt.

    attribute access.
